listSelection.title: Hello there. El Nath winters are incredibly cold, you're going to need a warm pair of shoes to survive.
Warrior shoes? Okay, then which set?
Bowman shoes? Okay, then which set?
Magician shoes? Okay, then which set?
Thief shoes? Okay, then which set?
